_sText:
If I have not credited you for a texture, please leave a comment below telling me.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

I got this map idea from playing "backalley_run_v2". Basically, one team is chosen to defend the a tower, while the other team is trying to attack it. The team defending the tower has a scout and 100hp. The team attacking the tower has a choice of 200hp or a USP.

After 1 minute, an afk killer will activate and after 3 minutes the team defending the tower will be allowed to leave the tower. 

There are about 10 guns scattered around the map on different buildings (all pistols and 1 AWP). And many smoke grenades all over the place.

I'm afraid on how the gameplay will be, but if the teams are too uneven, then I will simply make a v2.
